description: Astronomers using NASA’s James Webb Space Telescope have observed a massive helium cloud escaping from the super-puff exoplanet WASP-107b, marking the first direct detection of such atmospheric loss. Webb’s infrared data reveal an enormous exosphere nearly ten times the planet’s radius, with helium streaming both ahead of and behind the planet in its orbit. The findings show how extreme stellar radiation strips away WASP-107b’s outer layers, offering new insight into how low-density gas giants evolve under intense heat.
title: James Webb Space Telescope Spots an Exoplanet Losing Its Atmosphere in a Huge Helium Stream

description: To aid its ambitions of capturing a greater market share in the affordable space, Realme has launched the Realme P4x 5G, which sits below the Realme P4 in its device portfolio. Its price tag of Rs. 15,499 for the base variant with 6GB of RAM and 128GB of onboard storage puts it close to competitors like the Moto G67 Power, Redmi 15 5G, and the recently launched Realme C85 5G. So, does it manage to stand out? Here's our review.
title: Realme P4x 5G Review: Performance Champ But With Compromises

description: Blue Origin’s NS-37 mission is set to make history as Michi Benthaus, an ESA engineer and wheelchair user, becomes the first person with a mobility disability to travel to space. She will join Hans Koenigsmann and four other civilians on the suborbital flight. The mission underscores a growing push toward inclusive space tourism, as agencies and advocacy groups work to expand access to the final frontier for people of all abilities.
title: Blue Origin to Fly First Wheelchair User to Space on NS-37 Mission

description: China’s private launch company, LandSpace, successfully sent its Zhuque-3 rocket to low Earth orbit on its maiden flight, delivering its payload with an expendable upper stage. But the mission took a dramatic turn during recovery when one of the booster’s engines stalled in the landing burn, causing the stage to erupt in flames just meters from the pad. Despite the explosive failure, LandSpace says the flight validated key systems and provided crucial data to advance China’s reusable-rocket development.
title: China's Zhuque-3 Reaches Orbit but Booster Explodes in Failed Landing Attempt

description: A new study suggests that icy moons such as Mimas and Enceladus may host boiling subsurface oceans triggered by thinning ice shells and falling pressure. This low-temperature boiling could still support life beneath the surface. The research also explains geological features on larger icy moons and strengthens their potential as sites for finding extraterrestrial life.
title: Icy Moons Might Have Oceans That Briefly Boil, Study Suggests

description: Kapil Sharma’s iconic talk show is back with The Great Indian Kapil Show Season 4, streaming on Netflix from December 20. With Sunil Grover, Archana Puran Singh, Krushna Abhishek, and Kiku Sharda returning, the new season promises bigger comedy, new guests, and trademark humour. Fans can expect fresh sketches, celebrity interviews, and classic moments from the beloved comedy lineup. IMDb rating for the new season is not yet available.
title: The Great Indian Kapil Show Season 4 OTT Release: When, Where to Watch the Comedy Talk Show

description: The Hunter: Chapter 1” is a Telugu thriller starring Vaibhav Reddy as a crime writer who unexpectedly gets trapped in a murder mystery. What begins with a nurse’s suspicious death soon turns into a chain of dark, connected crimes. Directed by Sherief, the film offers gripping twists, strong performances by Nandita Swetha, Tanya Hope, and Saras Menon, and a tense narrative that keeps you hooked. Now streaming on Aha Tamil from December 4, 2025.
title: The Hunter: Chapter 1 OTT Release: When, Where to Watch the Tamil Mystery Thriller

description: Euphoria's long-awaited season 3 is all set to bring back emotional intensity in a bold world that captivates the attention of the viewers. The show has been created by Sam Levinson, and continues to explore the themes of identity, addiction, love, trauma and more with coming-of-age things. At this time with the help of mature spectacles, things have been showcased. After four years of delay, the season is finally prepared to release with fresh content and a deeper tone with a dark world and a leap of time.
title: Zendaya-Starrer Euphoria Season 3 OTT Release Date Teased: When, Where to Watch Online

description: Sberbank plans to expand its presence in India and hopes to secure a full banking licence within three years. CEO Herman Gref told Gadgets 360 that the bank built its own AI infrastructure despite Western sanctions, drawing on long-term investment, Chinese support and thousands of in-house engineers. Sberbank now wants to share its AI capabilities, including its GigaChat and Kandinsky models, with Indian partners.
title: Sberbank CEO Herman Gref on Developing AI Amid Sanctions and Bringing AI to India

description: Mithun Balaji directed Stephen also marks his debut. The movie is a thriller that talks about a character Stephen Jebaraj who is a serial killer. Police run after him and find the reason behind his murders. The story is full of unexpected twists and turns. It is a direct stream on the OTT. This movie is based on psychological crime and Stephen is interviewed by a psychologist. Later on, things turned up and it's really intriguing to see till the climax.
title: Stephen OTT Release Details: All You Need to Know About This Gomathi Shankar-Starring Thriller

description: Xiaomi Mix Trifold has been listed on a certification website with the model number 2608BPX34C, hinting at an imminent launch, according to a report. The phone will reportedly be launched by the Chinese smartphone maker in the third quarter of next year. The purported Mix Trifold is expected to rival Samsung's Galaxy Z TriFold and Huawei's Mate XT Ultimate Design. The listing does not reveal any specifications or features of the rumoured Xiaomi smartphone. However, such details are expected to surface online soon.
title: Xiaomi Mix Tri-Fold Smartphone Reportedly Listed on Certification Website, Could Launch Soon

description: The Tamil crime thriller Kuttram Purindhavan: The Guilty One is a web series, directed by Selvamani Muniyappan. It is set to make its digital debut tomorrow. The show will be released in Tamil, along with some dubbed versions in Malayalam, Hindi and Telugu. The web series is a suspense-driven crime thriller that is based on the disappearance of a young girl in a small village.
title: Kuttram Purindhavan: The Guilty One OTT Release Details: Know When, Where to Watch Crime-Thriller Series Online

description: Lee is a British biographical war drama film based on the life of famous photographer, Elizabeth "Lee" Miller and follows her life as she becomes a correspondent during the second world war. The film stars Kate Winslet in the lead role as the titular photographer, and the film is now set for its digital release on Lionsgate Play. It is a mixture of action and thriller with an emotional narrative. It shows how Lee takes you on an inspiring story against the odds.
title: Lee OTT Release: When, Where to Watch Kate Winslet-Starrer Biography Drama Online?

description: New research shows that shifting Antarctic circulation after the last Ice Age released ancient deep-ocean carbon into the atmosphere. Using Southern Ocean sediment cores, scientists traced how expanding Antarctic Bottom Water mixed long-isolated, carbon-rich waters upward. The findings reveal a major but underappreciated driver of early Holocene warming.
title: New Study Shows Antarctic Waters Unleashed Ancient Carbon at the Ice Age’s End

description: Thiruveer’s The Great Pre-Wedding Show is a charming comedy of errors set in the world of pre-wedding photography. Streaming from December 5 on Zee5 and OTTplay, the film balances humour, chaos, and family drama. With an IMDb rating of 8.4/10, it’s a must-watch for audiences looking for light-hearted Telugu cinema.
title: Thiruveer-Starring The Great Pre-Wedding Show Out on OTT Tomorrow: All the Details

description: Wake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mystery is an upcoming American mystery thriller film that serves as a sequel to 2022's Glass Onion: A Knives Out Mystery. Written and directed by Rian Johnson, the film follows the return of detective Benoit Blanc to investigate the most dangerous and complex case ever. This movie comes as the third installment of the popular Knives Out series. As per the teaser, the sequences appear to be highly gripping, engaging, and the mystery is promised to keep the audience hooked until the end.
title: Wake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mystery Streams on OTT Soon: Everything You Need to Know

description: Poco C85 5G will be available for purchase in India in three colourways, the tech firm has revealed via the phone's dedicated microsite. This comes soon after the Chinese smartphone maker announced that it will launch the handset in India on December 9. The key specifications and features of the soon-to-be-launched phone have also been teased. It is confirmed to pack a 6,000mAh battery, with 33W wired fast charging and 10W wired reverse charging support. It will be equipped with a 50-megapixel main rear camera.
title: Poco C85 5G Colourways, Design Revealed Ahead of India Launch: Expected Specifications, Features

description: A new study by NIST physicists shows that clocks on Mars run about 477 microseconds faster per day than identical clocks on Earth. The difference comes from Mars’s weaker gravity, orbital eccentricity, and gravitational influences across the solar system. Though tiny, this daily time lead will pose challenges for future Mars navigation and communication networks, requiring precise synchronisation between Earth- and Mars-based systems for mission safety and timing accuracy.
title: Scientists Find Clock on Mars Runs 477 Microseconds Faster Than Earth

description: The 2025 Geminid meteor shower peaks on December 13–14, offering bright, frequent meteors under dark skies thanks to a thin crescent Moon. Originating from asteroid 3200 Phaethon, the Geminids can produce over 100 meteors per hour. Best viewing is after midnight from clear, dark locations.
title: Supermoon and Geminid Meteor Shower 2025 Set to Peak Soon: How to See It

description: Nothing Phone 3 and Phone 3a and other handsets in the company's existing smartphone lineup are confirmed to see price cuts during the upcoming Flipkart Buy Buy 2025 Sale. These smartphones will be available at discounted prices during the sale. The CMF Phone 2 Pro, CMF Buds 2a, Buds 2, Buds 2 Plus and the CMF Watch Pro 2 will also be available at discounted rates during the Flipkart Buy Buy 2025 Sale.
title: Flipkart Buy Buy 2025 Sale: Nothing Phone 3, Phone 3a, CMF Phone 2 Pro, More to Get Discounts

description: Binance Blockchain Week 2025 will host a major debate between CZ and Peter Schiff, where both will discuss whether Bitcoin or tokenised gold is better suited for the evolving digital economy. The conversation comes at a time when real-world asset tokenisation is rising and institutional interest is shifting. Their contrasting views could influence how investors evaluate the future role of digital and physical stores of value.
title: Bitcoin vs Tokenised Gold: CZ and Peter Schiff Ready to Face Off in Debate

description: Apple design chief Alan Dye is reportedly leaving the company to join Meta, where he will lead a new division focused on hardware, software and AI interfaces. Apple has confirmed longtime designer Stephen Lemay as his replacement. Dye, known for overseeing the Liquid Glass design language, is expected to become Meta’s Chief Design Officer on December 31 as the iPhone maker faces a wave of senior executive departures.
title: Apple’s Design Chief Responsible for Liquid Glass UI Reportedly Departs to Join Meta

description: Flipkart Buy Buy 2025 sale will begin soon, the company has announced. The six-day sale event will be live till December 10. It will offer a range of electronics, including smartphones, laptops, true wireless stereo (TWS), and Bluetooth speakers, at relatively low prices. The company has teased the deals on Apple’s iPhone 16, the Samsung Galaxy S24, Poco M7 Plus 5G, and Vivo T4x 5G. Moreover, Flipkart has announced that it will offer instant discounts on credit and debit cards of select banks.
title: Flipkart Buy Buy 2025 Sale Date Announced; Discounts on iPhone 16, Samsung Galaxy S24, and More Expected

description: Realme has launched the Realme Watch 5 in India alongside the Realme P4x 5G. Priced at Rs. 4,499, with an offer price of Rs. 3,999, it goes on sale on December 10. The smartwatch features a 1.97-inch AMOLED display, Bluetooth calling, NFC, independent GPS, and 108 sports modes. Health tools include heart rate, SpO₂, sleep, stress, and menstruation tracking. It is claimed to offer up to 20 days of battery life in Light Mode and comes with an IP68 rating for dust and water resistance.
title: Realme Watch 5 Launched in India With 1.97-Inch AMOLED Display, Up to 16-Day Battery Life: Price, Features

description: Global foldable smartphone shipments increased by 14 percent year-on-year (YoY) in the third quarter (Q3) of 2025, according to a report by a market research firm. The growth is attributed to the adoption of foldable smartphones across premium-focused segments. The market analysis reveals that book-style foldable models were amongst the most popular choices, led by the Galaxy Z Fold 7, which also helped Samsung maintain its position as the market leader.
title: Global Foldable Shipments Increase in Q3 2025 as Samsung Retains Market Lead: Counterpoint

description: Google has expanded its in-call scam protection feature. The company announced the feature in the US in association with JPMorgan Chase and Cash App. This feature shows alerts to users if they are on a call with an unknown number while screen sharing and using a financial app. The system warns about potential scams. Users will get options to end the call and stop screen sharing with a single tap.
title: Google Expands In-Call Scam Protection for Banking Apps: Here's How It Works on Android

description: Netflix is reportedly preparing to sell Spry Fox back to its original founders, according to a new report. The studio, acquired in 2022, is said to return to independent status as Netflix shifts its gaming strategy. Spry Fox will continue developing Spirit Crossing, with Netflix still publishing the 2025 mobile release while the studio seeks other platform partners. Possible layoffs and funding needs may remain concerns for Spry Fox.
title: Netflix Reportedly Sells Spry Fox Back to Founders as Company Shifts Gaming Strategy

description: Oppo Pad 5 could launch in India soon. Ahead of the formal reveal, it has bagged certification from the Bureau of Indian Standards (BIS) website. The listing suggests OPD2503 and OPD2502 model numbers with registration number R-93038296. The OPD2503 was certified on November 13, and OPD2502 on November 11. The Chinese variant of the Oppo Pad 5 runs on the MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ chipset.
title: Oppo Pad 5 Receives BIS Certification, Suggesting Imminent Launch in India

description: Xiaomi 17 Ultra, the purported successor to the Chinese tech firm’s Xiaomi 15 Ultra, is tipped to be unveiled later this month. The handset is expected to be powered by Qualcomm’s flagship octa core 3nm Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset. Various key specifications of the rumoured smartphone have been leaked online recently. Now, a tipster has shared a real-life image of the handset without a rear panel cover, which hints at a redesigned camera deco. The Xiaomi 15 Ultra, on the other hand, features a Leica-branded circular rear camera module.
title: Xiaomi 17 Ultra Design Spotted in Leaked Image That Hints at Redesigned Rear Camera Module

description: Amazon has launched an Alexa+ feature for Fire TV that lets viewers jump to specific scenes in Prime Video movies by describing them aloud. The tool uses natural language understanding, metadata from Prime Video’s X-Ray, and AI models such as Amazon Nova and Anthropic Claude to identify and play exact moments. It supports thousands of movies and works with Prime titles as well as purchased or rented films. Alexa+ also offers additional viewing tools, including actor details, soundtrack information, and live sports updates.
title: Amazon's Alexa+ AI Scene Search Feature Rolls Out to Prime Video on Fire TV: Here's How It Works

description: Bitcoin hovered near $93,200 (roughly Rs. 84.1 lakh) as softer US labour data reinforced expectations of a Federal Reserve rate cut and supported broader market sentiment. Ethereum and major altcoins also posted gains, while analysts highlighted improving liquidity and institutional interest. Bitcoin must hold key support levels to sustain momentum ahead of upcoming macro triggers, including the US jobless claims report and the FOMC meeting.
title: Bitcoin Price Consolidates Near $93,200 as Crypto Market Recovers From November Slowdown

description: Google Workspace Studio is now live, allowing business and enterprise users to create AI agents that automate tasks across Workspace apps using natural-language prompts. Built on Gemini 3 Pro, the platform supports workflows across Gmail, Docs, Sheets, Drive, Chat and external tools. The update makes enterprise-grade automation accessible without coding or scripting.
title: Google Workspace Studio Launched, Lets Users Create AI Agents for Automation

description: Infinix Note 60 Ultra will be the first smartphone from the Chinese tech firm to be designed by the Italian sports car designer Pininfarina, the company announced on Wednesday. The key specifications, launch date, availability, and pricing details of the handset will be announced in the coming days, according to the press release. Additionally, the phone brand has revealed that the Infinix Note 60 series is currently in development, and will be unveiled as the successor to the Note 50 lineup.
title: Infinix Note 60 Ultra to Launch as Firm’s First Smartphone Designed by Pininfarina

description: Apple on Wednesday seeded the iOS 26.2 Release Candidate (RC) to developers and beta testers. Such updates do not include any new features but carry the finalised ones introduced in previous beta versions. The iOS 26.2 update for iPhone is expected to bring Reminder Alarms, one-time AirDrop code for file sharing, expanded AirPods Live Translation to the EU, and other improvements. The tech giant, notably, has also begun pushing the iOS 26 upgrade more prominently to iOS 18 users.
title: iOS 26.2 Release Candidate Update Rolls Out to Beta Testers as Apple Prompts Users to Upgrade to iOS 26

description: Micron is shutting down its consumer-focused Crucial brand to prioritise fast-growing AI and data-centre memory segments. The company will stop shipping Crucial products by February 2026, though warranties remain valid. Micron says the shift will help support larger enterprise customers amid soaring AI-driven demand. The move ends nearly three decades of consumer RAM and SSD releases and comes during a global memory shortage.
title: Micron Announces Exit from Consumer Business, to Shut Down Crucial Amid Global RAM Shortage

description: Realme P4x 5G has been launched in India with MediaTek Dimensity 7400 Ultra chipset alongside up to 8GB of RAM and up to 256GB of onboard storage. It has a 7,000mAh battery and a 6.72-inch display, and a dual rear camera unit. It has an 8-megapixel selfie shooter and an IP64-rated build for dust and water resistance.
title: Realme P4x 5G Launched in India With MediaTek Dimensity 7400 Ultra SoC, 7,000mAh Battery: Price, Features

description: Samsung will host 'The First Look' event on January 4, 2026, at 7pm local time (January 5, 8:30pm IST) in the Latour Ballroom at the Wynn Las Vegas, US. While little is known about whether the event will feature any product launches, the tech giant did say that it will unveil its vision for the DX Divison for the next year. The company is also expected to globally launch and showcase its Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold, which was debuted in South Korea on December 2. The US pricing of the handset could also be announced.
title: Samsung Schedules 'The First Look' Event Two Days Ahead of CES 2026; Galaxy Z TriFold Global Launch Expected

description: Apple on Thursday announced the expansion of Hypertension Notifications to India, along with select other markets. First released as part of the watchOS 26 update in September, the feature analyses data collected by the Apple Watch to alert the user if a pattern of chronic blood pressure or hypertension is detected. As per the tech giant, the evaluation is carried out over a period of 30 days, from the day the Hypertension Notifications feature was set up.
title: Apple Brings Hypertension Notifications Feature for Apple Watch to India: How to Use, Requirements, and More

description: iPhone 17e is expected to go official in the first half of next year. Leaks have already suggested a design upgrade for the iPhone 17e; now, a new leak from Korea states that it will have the same OLED screen as the iPhone 14 released in 2022. It is said to feature thin bezels around the display. Apple's panel suppliers BOE, Samsung Display and LG Display are said to be preparing to ship displays for the iPhone 17e.
title: iPhone 17e Expected to Arrive With Thinner Bezels Alongside Dynamic Island: Report

description: A new leak has revealed battery details for the upcoming Galaxy Buds 4 lineup. This leak follows earlier design leaks showing a more angular look. The standard Buds 4 may use 42mAh batteries, slightly lower than the Buds 3, while the Buds 4 Pro could upgrade to 57mAh cells. Despite smaller batteries than older models like the Buds 2, real-world endurance has stayed similar due to efficiency gains. The charging case may see only a minor three percent increase in capacity.
title: Samsung Galaxy Buds 4 Leak Hints at Smaller Battery; Galaxy Buds 4 Pro Could Get a Slight Upgrade

description: Spotify has begun rolling out 2025 Wrapped. The personalised experience, which the platform has been releasing since 2019 on the first day of December, features top artists, albums, songs, playlists, and podcasts that you have played throughout the year. Big changes, however, have been made this year, beginning with a new multiplayer feature called Wrapped Party. Further, the Top Songs playlist will now include the play count, while there are also Top Song Quiz, Listening Age, and Wrapped Clubs features.
title: Spotify's 2025 Wrapped Gains Party Mode Feature for Live, Group Stat Comparison

description: Realme P4x 5G is set to launch in India later today at noon. Once unveiled, the phone will go on sale in the country via Flipkart and the Realme India online store. It will be offered in white, green, and pink colour options, as per the teasers. It is confirmed to carry a 50-megapixel primary rear camera, housed inside a pill-shaped module. The handset is claimed to be capable of shooting 4K resolution videos, too. Moreover, it will ship with 8GB of RAM and 256GB of UFS 3.1 internal storage.
title: Realme P4x 5G Launching Today: Know Price in India, Features, Specifications and More
